name: Trip's Aim Trainer
description:
Wanna get better at those flicks that you're just not able to hit consistently? Or wanna be able to not fluke those headshots? This is the tool for you.

Allows you to change the sensitivity to your in-game comfort and change the speed of spawning of targets to get train your Round or Game winning shots!!

I'm Tripwire and this is Trip's Aim Trainer! Enjoy and have GOOD GAMES!

GILGS
